aboutme:
I am a 20yo IT student from the Czech Republic, currently studying the Faculty of Informatics at MUNI.

webdev: I spend a lot of time creating websites because they are very accessible and practical. I fell in love with Bootstrap, which I knew even before CSS itself, and which shapes the look of all my webpages. I have used Django in the past and worked with Flask at school. I've also tried Vue.js and even Nuxt.

next: I have a good knowledge of Python. I enjoyed creating games in Unity (C#). From relational databases, I know MySQL and SQLite. I'm proficient with Git. Linux fan.

currently: I like to learn new things and technologies. I am currently learning Java in the form of Minecraft modding. I'm also fascinated by AI and would like to experiment with Stable Diffusion in the future.
hobbies:
I mostly spend my free time self-learning and creating my ideas, accompanied by good music. In my Spotify playlist you can find different genres from Beethoven to Finnish pop.

sport: I don't like winter and that's why I'm most active in the summer, when the weather is nice. I like cycling, swimming and roller-skating.

Sometimes I have a video game session with my friends :).
